faq.question: Do you offer a course on website sales?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer a comprehensive course on website sales that covers everything from lead generation to closing deals. Our course is designed to help you maximize your online sales potential.

general_questions.question: How do I enroll in a course on your website?
general_questions.answer: To enroll in a course, visit our website, browse the available courses, and click on the 'Enroll Now' button. Follow the instructions to complete your registration.

general_questions.question: What payment methods are accepted for course purchases?
general_questions.answer: We accept various payment methods including credit/debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. You can choose your preferred payment option during the checkout process.

general_questions.question: Can I access the course materials after completion?
general_questions.answer: Yes, once you have completed a course, you will have lifetime access to the course materials, allowing you to revisit the content anytime.

general_questions.question: Do you offer any discounts or promotions on courses?
general_questions.answer: We occasionally offer discounts and promotions on our courses. Subscribe to our newsletter or follow us on social media to stay updated on the latest offers.

general_questions.question: Is there a refund policy for course purchases?
general_questions.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day refund policy for course purchases. If you are not satisfied with a course, you can request a refund within 30 days of purchase.

general_questions.question: Are there any prerequisites for enrolling in a course?
general_questions.answer: Some courses may have prerequisites, which will be listed in the course description. Please review the course details to ensure you meet any necessary requirements.

general_questions.question: How can I contact support if I have issues with a course?
general_questions.answer: If you encounter any issues, you can contact our support team via the 'Contact Us' page on our website. We are here to assist you with any questions or concerns.
